faqs.question: Kan utlendinger kjøpe eiendom i Spania?
faqs.answer: Yes, absolutely. Foreign nationals enjoy equal property purchase rights as Spanish citizens. No visa requirement exists specifically for property ownership, though you'll need a Spanish fiscal identification number (NIE) and can utilize Spanish mortgages. British, Northern European, and international buyers form a substantial proportion of Costa Blanca purchasers.

faqs.question: Hva koster det å kjøpe eiendom i Spania?
faqs.answer: Beyond the purchase price, expect additional costs: transfer tax (6-10% in Murcia), notary fees (0.5-1%), registry fees (0.3%), and legal fees (0.5-1%). Total acquisition costs typically total 8-13% of purchase price. The Spanish government offers tax benefits and favorable terms for non-resident buyers investing in new-build properties.
